column5: http://www.canadiantire.ca/AST/browse/5/SportsRec/Fishing/RodReelCombos/PRD~0783309P/Rapala%252BDownrigger%252BCombo.jsp?locale=en  Are they worth it as a decent starter rod and reel for trolling in Lake Huron?  Any other suggestions?

I am not sure if you need it right away or not.  But, they did have them on sale for $99.99 a while back.  They do tend to repeat their sales.  p.s. Why do they put lead core line on a down rigger combo?
I was looking at picking the same combo out to use as a trolling rod for dipsy divers.  Checked it out at Basspro and seemed pretty decent - also about 20 bucks cheaper there btw.
A guy I know uses them with success and no issues to speak of. I'm sure there are better rods/reels but these seem to fit the profile of what is needed and I've not heard any poor feedback.
